boardgame.name: Fly Europe
Pociągi: Europa
Trans Europa
Trans Europa+
Transeuropa
boardgame.description: Trans Europa is a simple railway game. Each player has a set of five cities strung across Europe that need to be connected by rail. Players place either one or two rails each turn. The first player to connect their five cities wins the round, with all other players losing points for being too slow! After 3-4 rounds, the player with the most points wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One version of this game, TransEuropa+, includes the Vexation expansion of colored rails, with each of the six colors having three colored rails. When you place one of these rails on the board, it counts only as part of your network and not anyone else's._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2018 edition of Transeuropa, which is the preferred spelling of the publisher although the box suggests otherwise, includes a slightly different map of Europe, with the colored cities rotated so that all of the yellow cities are in the UK and Scandinavia. What's more, these cities are separated from others by double-squiggly lines that represent spaces where a ferry can go. As with the Vexation expansion, in this edition each player has three colored rails, and on a ferry route up to two rails can be placed, whether both colored rails or one being colored and the other a normal black rail line that any player can use. A player can lay only one colored rail per turn, and they can claim both possible rail lines in a ferry space. A ferry space is not complete unless it contains two rail lines._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2005 Spiel der Spiele Game of the Year Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGB Volume 1 - Session Review with Palazzo, Shadows Over Camelot, Through The Desert, TransEuropa and Werewolf in Brief
BGTG 28 - SR: Way Out West, TransEuropa

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Rio Grande Games (RIO 273)

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. GST _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;/or PST are applicable on all orders depending on your location. Shipping will depend on your location. I will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. Please email me with any questions. Thanks Jason Schill JJSUPERSTORE jason@fadzone.com
Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Rio Grande Games (RIO 273)

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be received within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.4% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com www.alwaysgreatgames.com

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax.

Rio Grande Games (RIO 273) Type: Map building Number of players: 2-6 Age of players: 8+ Length: 30 minutes Languages Available: English Game Description: Now it is time to go railroading in Europa. Just like Transamerica, players work together building a railroad network, but this time it is across Europe instead of the United States. The first to have their five cities connected winds the round - the others lose points for being too slow! After 3-4 rounds, the player with the most points wins the game! Author: Franz-Benno DeLonge
